thinking: I'll open Google Scholar and search for a reputable academic survey on AI agents (multi-agent reinforcement learning paper by Busoniu is a well-known survey). I'll navigate to scholar.google.com, run the search, wait for results to load, and take a screenshot so I can inspect results and open the best matching paper next.

actions.explanation: Focus the browser address bar to navigate to Google Scholar.
Wait for Google Scholar to load.

actions.value: "A Survey of Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning" Busoniu
